#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
 
#define MOD 1000000007
unsigned long long int fact(unsigned long long int N,unsigned long long int K)
{
         unsigned long long int prod=1,i;
         for(i=1;i<=K;i++)
         {
                 prod=(prod*N)%MOD;
                 --N;
         }
         return prod;
}
 
int main()
{
        int T;
        unsigned long long int N,K;
        scanf("%d",&T);
        while(T>0)
        {
               scanf("%llu%llu",&N,&K);
               printf("%llu\n",fact(N,K));
               --T;
        }
        return 0;
}
